variables.TemplateUsage: Is used to create virtual machine monitoring rules.

source.query:
[concat('Heartbeat
| where _ResourceId == "" 
| summarize LastHeartbeat=max(TimeGenerated) by Computer 
| where LastHeartbeat < ago(5m)')]

resources.name: [concat('Logical Disk - Current Disk Queue Length - Critical (NonAzure)')]

properties.description: [concat('Logical Disk - Current Disk Queue Length - Critical (NonAzure)')]

source.query:
[concat('Perf
| where _ResourceId == "" 
| where ObjectName == "LogicalDisk" 
| where CounterName == "Current Disk Queue Length" 
| where InstanceName <> "_Total" and InstanceName <> "HarddiskVolume1"
//| where TimeGenerated > ago(15m)
| summarize AggregatedValue=avg(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m), Computer, InstanceName
//| where AggregatedValue  > 5')]
